abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column urges homeowners to explore whether federal Home Affordable Refinance Program can benefit them; notes program is intended to help those who do not quality for traditional refinancing due to drop in their home's value, and that program will expire in 2015.
lead_paragraph: People with little or no equity in their homes could be helped by the Home Affordable Refinance Program, which is scheduled to end this year.
snippet: People with little or no equity in their homes could be helped by the Home Affordable Refinance Program, which is scheduled to end this year.

headline.main: 700,000 Homeowners Could Still Benefit From U.S. HARP Refinancing
headline.print_headline: 700,000 Homeowners Could Still Benefit From U.S. HARP Refinancing
